title: “Plot Armour” - Death in D&D with Emma Carlson
itunes:title: “Plot Armour” - Death in D&D with Emma Carlson
description:
Today we are joined by the creative lead of Blackwater DnD, mental health adviser for Jasper's Game Day & registered councilor, Emma Carlson. We talk to Emma about using Dungeons and Dragons as a therapy tool in her work and handling the topic of death in game.


If you enjoy this podcast please help us out by leaving a review and sharing it with your fellow adventurers.
